translations: 不好看的；丑怪的；不匀称的

sentences.sentence: The wrong of unshapely things is a wrong too great to be told;
sentences.translation: 那些丑恶的东西犯下了弥天的大过；

sentences.sentence: This cup is very different from the unshapely hand-made and sundried pottery of the Stone Period.
sentences.translation: 这个杯子和石器时代手工做成，用阳光晒干的奇形怪状的瓷器很不一样。
